   20: 
   21: -module(t21_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -compile(export_all).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: 
   27: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   28: %% @spec suite() -> Info
   29: %% Info = [tuple()]
   30: %% @end
   31: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   32: suite() ->
   33:     [{require,file},
   34:      {require,tcname},
   35:      {timetrap,{seconds,1}}].
   36: 
   37: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   38: %% @spec init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   39: %%     Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   40: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   41: %% Reason = term()
   42: %% @end
   43: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   44: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   45:     TCName = ct:get_config(tcname),
   46:     CfgFiles = ct:get_config(file,undefined,[all]),
   47: 
   48:     %% verify that expected config file can be read
   49:     case {TCName,CfgFiles} of 
   50: 	{start_separate,[cfg11]} -> ok;
   51: 	{start_join,[cfg11,cfg21]} -> ok;
   52: 	{incl_separate1,[cfg11]} -> ok;
   53: 	{incl_separate2,[cfg11]} -> ok;
   54: 	{incl_join1,[cfg21,cfg11]} -> ok;
   55: 	{incl_join1,[cfg12,cfg11,cfg21]} -> ok;
   56: 	{incl_join2,[cfg21,cfg11,cfg12]} -> ok;
   57: 	{incl_both1,[cfg11]} -> ok;
   58: 	{incl_both2,[cfg11,cfg12,cfg21]} -> ok;
   59: 	{incl_both2,[cfg11]} -> ok;
   60: 	_ -> ok
   61:     end,
   62: 
   63:      %% test the get_testspec_terms functionality
   64:     if CfgFiles /= undefined ->
   65: 	    TSTerms = case ct:get_testspec_terms() of
   66: 			  undefined -> exit('testspec should not be undefined');
   67: 			  Result -> Result
   68: 		      end,
   69: 	    true = lists:keymember(config, 1, TSTerms),
   70: 	    {config,TSCfgFiles} = ct:get_testspec_terms(config),
   71: 	    [{config,TSCfgFiles},{tests,Tests}] = 
   72: 		ct:get_testspec_terms([config,tests]),
   73: 	    CfgNames = [list_to_atom(filename:basename(TSCfgFile)) ||
   74: 			   {Node,TSCfgFile} <- TSCfgFiles, Node == node()],
   75: 	    true = (length(CfgNames) == length(CfgFiles)),
   76: 	    [true = lists:member(CfgName,CfgFiles) || CfgName <- CfgNames],
   77: 	    true = lists:any(fun({{_Node,_Dir},Suites}) ->
   78: 				     lists:keymember(?MODULE, 1, Suites)
   79: 			     end, Tests);
   80:        true ->
   81: 	    ok
   82:     end,
   83: 
   84:     Config.
   85: 
   86: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   87: %% @spec end_per_suite(Config0) -> void() | {save_config,Config1}
   88: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   89: %% @end
   90: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   91: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   92:     ok.
   93: 
   94: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   95: %% @spec init_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   96: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   97: %% GroupName = atom()
   98: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   99: %% Reason = term()
  100: %% @end
  101: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  102: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  103:     Config.
  104: 
  105: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  106: %% @spec end_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
  107: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
  108: %% GroupName = atom()
  109: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  110: %% @end
  111: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  112: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
  113:     ok.
  114: 
  115: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  116: %% @spec init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
  117: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
  118: %% TestCase = atom()
  119: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  120: %% Reason = term()
  121: %% @end
  122: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  123: init_per_testcase(autoskip_tc, Config) ->
  124:     exit(kaboom),
  125:     Config;
  126: 
  127: init_per_testcase(userskip_tc, Config) ->
  128:     {skip,"user skipped"};
  129: 
  130: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  131:     Config.
  132: 
  133: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  134: %% @spec end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
  135: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1} | {fail,Reason}
  136: %% TestCase = atom()
  137: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  138: %% Reason = term()
  139: %% @end
  140: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  141: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
  142:     ok.
  143: 
  144: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  145: %% @spec groups() -> [Group]
  146: %% Group = {GroupName,Properties,GroupsAndTestCases}
  147: %% GroupName = atom()
  148: %% Properties = [parallel | sequence | Shuffle | {RepeatType,N}]
  149: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [Group | {group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  150: %% TestCase = atom()
  151: %% Shuffle = shuffle | {shuffle,{integer(),integer(),integer()}}
  152: %% RepeatType = repeat | repeat_until_all_ok | repeat_until_all_fail |
  153: %%              repeat_until_any_ok | repeat_until_any_fail
  154: %% N = integer() | forever
  155: %% @end
  156: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  157: groups() ->
  158:     [].
  159: 
  160: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  161: %% @spec all() -> GroupsAndTestCases | {skip,Reason}
  162: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [{group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  163: %% GroupName = atom()
  164: %% TestCase = atom()
  165: %% Reason = term()
  166: %% @end
  167: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  168: all() -> 
  169:     [ok_tc, exit_tc, to_tc, autoskip_tc, userskip_tc].
  170: 
  171: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  172: %% @spec TestCase(Config0) ->
  173: %%               ok | exit() | {skip,Reason} | {comment,Comment} |
  174: %%               {save_config,Config1} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
  175: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  176: %% Reason = term()
  177: %% Comment = term()
  178: %% @end
  179: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  180: ok_tc(_) ->
  181:     ok.
  182: 
  183: exit_tc(_) ->
  184:     exit(kaboom),
  185:     ok.
  186: 
  187: to_tc(_) ->
  188:     ct:timetrap(1),
  189:     ct:sleep(100),
  190:     ok.
  191: 
  192: autoskip_tc(_) ->
  193:     ok.
  194: 
  195: userskip_tc(_) ->
  196:     ok.
  197:     
  198: 
  199: 
  200:
